Title: The Mettle of Man
Writer: Rick Jacobson, Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Arielle Carver-O'Neill
Plot: Elk Grove undergoes a major battle that takes place on the streets, Ash rides high in a military tank, speeding across shaky, post-apocalyptic Elk Grove. Ash fights the biggest battle of them all - a sixty foot tall Kandarian demon.
